name: Consuming Bellow
description:
Jormungandr draws power from toxic clouds nearby while channeling for 1.2s. At the end of the channel Jormungandr roars dealing damage to all Enemies, trembling and slowing Enemy gods by 30% for 1.5s. Each cloud increases the size of Consuming Bellow and Empowers him up to 3 times while also dealing extra damage to Enemies hit. Extra damage after the first instance is halved.
While Empowered, Jormungandr's basic attack fires at its fastest rate.
stats: Bonus Damage: 20/25/30/35/40 (5% of your magical power)
